title: 1 Bedroom Affordable Housing for Seniors and Disabled
posting_body: St. Clements Manor provides affordable apartment for seniors 62 + and the disabled.
We are a professionally managed community with handicap accessible apartment homes.
Heat, water, trash pick up and snow removal are all included in your monthly rent.
You'll find our community to be a friendly, welcoming place to call home.
We look forward to meeting and having you as a resident so call us today!
